name: nyt-most-popular
description: Provides services for getting the most popular articles on NYTimes.com based on emails, shares, or views.  Get most emailed articles for the last day: ``` /emailed/1.json ```  Get most shared articles on Facebook for the last day: ``` /shared/1/facebook.json ```  Get most viewed articles for the last seven days: ``` /viewed/7.json ```  ## Example Calls ``` https://api.nytimes.com/svc/mostpopular/v2/emailed/7.json?api-key=yourkey ```  ``` https://api.nytimes.com/svc/mostpopular/v2/shared/1/facebook.json?api-key=yourkey ```  ``` https://api.nytimes.com/svc/mostpopular/v2/viewed/1.json?api-key=yourkey ```
